# Load data

```{r data, cache = F, echo = T}
# relation
load("~/Datasets/GAIT_2/K.RData")

# general data
load_all()
dat <- thesis.norm.platelets()

## check
stopifnot(sum(is.na(dat$IPFCT)) == 86)
stopifnot(sum(is.na(dat$PFAepin)) == 34)
```

# Models

```{r models}
# variables
vars <- thesis.traits.platelets()
models <- list()

# function
for(i in vars){
	cat("###", i, "\n")

	covlist <- thesis.covlist_plt.norm(i)
	mods <- thesis.mod.norm(dat, i, covlist)

models[[length(models) + 1]] = mods
}
